title: Grimm Fairy Tales: Different Seasons Volume 1
description: For over two hundred years the powerful stories of the Brothers Grimm have enchanted millions around the world, but there has never been an adaptation as intriguing or provocative as this. Grimm Fairy Tales explores a much darker side of the infamous fables you heard as a child as these classic tales are retold and re-imagined with a terrifying twist you'll simply love as an adult.Different Seasons collects some of the most popular Grimm Fairy Tales one-shots, including GFT 2009 Annual, GFT 2009 Halloween and Holiday editions, and Giant-Sized Grimm Fairy Tales #1.
author: Joe Brusha
